title: Retrieving data from server
body:
Hey! 2 days ago i frist had this problem when in champ select i get "retriving data from server" message. Later this message was everywhere. In profile, when i try to create custom game and even in log in screen. I repair game but it doesnt help. There is only one thing that works for me and its downloading game again and again but it takes a lot of time. Help me please. I dont know what to do and i tried like all things i found to repair this. What i can do to play this game again?
EDIT:
Today i played 3 games and i need to download game again because i cant log in or start game.

replies.body:
Heya
Try the following:
Windowsbutton +R > services.msc > search the IP-Helper, stop and disable it in it start up settings(rightclick>properties)(otherwise its gonna activate everytime you start your pc) Afterwards test if the problem still occurs.

Regards Rkoturdo
Thx for your respond. I tried it yesterday and it doesnt work for me

Heya
Could you run Netalyzr and post the link here?
 [Netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/) 

Regards Rkoturdo

http://n1.netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/summary/id=43ca253f-10853-a8317ef9-4db9-4e6e-b255
If you something more just tell me

Heya
Meh, this is like the cleanest netalyzr i have ever seen. The only thing wrong is that your clock i a little bit late( 16 seconds). You could try scnchronizing it again, but i dont think that resolves the issue. 
You said you already tried some things, what exactly did you try?

Regards Rkoturdo

Ps: did netalyzr automatically switch to english? just asking :D

Yes i think it switch automatically.
I tried this:
http://forums.euw.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=1020888
and some other things i dont remember because it was 2 days ago.
Something with IPv6 and Ip-Helper.

Heya
Can you try the following:
Search for cmd and run it as admin. Execute the following commands:
netsh int ip reset(enter)
netsh winsock reset(enter)
ipconfig /release(enter)
ipconfig /renew(enter)
ipconfig /flushdns(enter)
(one space after ipconfig)
Restart your pc and try if the problem still occurs.

Regards Rkoturdo

Nope. I cant log in. I have same looong log in screen and after this when i try to do something in client like start game i have "retrieving data...".
Maybe its server issue, because 2/3 days ago everything was ok and now i cant even play single game.

Heya
Maybe it is, i heard someone saying it. But i wanted to try a few things first before just saying its the servers. Atm U dont have any other ideas. 

Regards Rkoturdo

I will try download game again.
Maybe after next patch (probably 08.07.2015) it will somehow fix.

Heya
If it is a server issue i am sure Riot is fixing it asap.

Regards Rkoturdo
Oh and thx for your help. I'll tell you when i fix this
keep this replying thing going LOL

Hey,

Press "Enter" twice or Space Once.

Let me know if this helps.

BUMP!
I still have the same problem. Now i have unknown errors too.
Someone?
